import React from 'react'; import LucasFace from "../assets/Lucas_Pao.JPG"; import {Redirect} from 'react-router-dom'; class Experience extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { redirectLink: "/experience" }; } handleClick(page) { const link = this.state.redirectLink.concat(page); this.setState({redirectLink: link}) } render() { if(this.state.redirectLink !== "/experience") { return } return (

Experience

Education

Sep 2019 - May 2023:

HARVARD UNIVERSITY | Cambridge, MA

B.A. in Computer Science (Honors), Minor in Mathematics

Honors: Cum Laude

Coursework: Machine Learning, Data Structures and Algorithms, Systems Programming, Product Design, Theoretical Computer Science, Probability, Abstract Algebra, Complex Analysis

Sep 2023 - Jul 2024:

BERKLEE COLLEGE OF MUSIC | Boston, MA {'\u2192'} New York, NY

M.A. Candidate in Creative Media and Technology

Harvard-Berklee Dual Degree Program



Work Experience

Work Experience CAPITAL ONE Software Engineer Intern Engineered protocols in Swift that mock API calls to replace 200+ static testing files used to validate UI testing cases for the main EASE app that has millions of users. PHOTON COMMERCE San Francisco, CA Software Engineer Intern Jun 2021 - Aug 2021 Implemented new text analytics algorithms in Python improving accuracy from 38% to 71% of address data collection, conducted competitor analysis by coding scripts of accuracy reports on competing FinTech APIs. Leadership & Activities HARVARD INNOVATION LABS Venture Program Launched and coded MVP for TapJams (social music composition platform), rendering frontend interface of musical instruments in React JS, creating backend audio mixing algorithms in Python (Flask). HARVARD DATAMATCH Cambridge, MA Full-Stack Developer Nov 2020 - Feb 2022 Developed scheduling and message reacting features with React JS frontend and Google Firebase backend, connecting 40,000+ college students from 30+ colleges. HARVARD UNIVERSITY Cambridge, MA Math Course Assistant Positions - developed educational apps, graded coding assignments, prepared notes ● AM 107: Graph Theory and Combinatorics ● MATH S-152: Discrete Mathematics ● MATH S-23a: Linear Algebra and Real Analysis I HARVARD GLEE CLUB Technology Chair - managed club website, authentication system, email lists Jan 2021 - May 2021 May 2020 - Aug 2020 May 2020 - Aug 2020 Cambridge, MA Jan 2021 - May 2021
